description: An alert sent when a pre-defined pattern was
matched text in a consoles serial character stream
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD OG-PATTERN-MIB::ogpatnEventOccurred OG-PATTERN-MIB::ogpatnEventDescription s EXAMPLE OG-PATTERN-MIB::ogpatnEventText s EXAMPLE OG-PATTERN-MIB::ogpatnEventPortNumber i 9999 OG-PATTERN-MIB::ogpatnEventPortLabel s EXAMPLE

description: A description of the matches purpose
variables.name: OG-PATTERN-MIB::ogpatnEventDescription

description: The full text which matched the pattern
variables.name: OG-PATTERN-MIB::ogpatnEventText

description: Serial port number on which the pattern matched
variables.name: OG-PATTERN-MIB::ogpatnEventPortNumber

description: The label for the serial port where pattern matched occurred
variables.name: OG-PATTERN-MIB::ogpatnEventPortLabel
